overview:
Raul joins Toonups following a seventeen year career in financial operations and management in the travel and entertainment industries, including two years advising companies in the virtual gaming industry. One of the many accomplishments in Raul’s career was the successful buyout and subsequent merger of, LAPSA, turning it profitable within a one year span. As a Senior member of South African Airways for the Americas, Raul supported all aspects of the business from Canada to Argentina, while at the same time providing valuable financial and operational advice to executives improving company’s efficiencies and profitability system wide. Raul started his career as a commodities broker specializing in hedging.

Raul earned his BA in Economics/Mathematics from The University of Texas, at Austin, and an MBA in Finance from Florida International University.
